snippet: The two companies, partners of the enterprise software maker, will take ownership stakes in the biggest leveraged buyout of the year.
abstract: DealBook Online; Microsoft and Salesforce Ventures will join Permira and the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board in private equity buyout of Informatica; shareholders will recieve $48.65 a share in $5.3 billion deal.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The two companies, partners of the enterprise software maker, will take ownership stakes in the biggest leveraged buyout of the year.

headline.main: Salesforce Ventures and Microsoft Join Informatica Buyout
